_sText:
This room was inspired by the mansion.
/ * / * / * / * / *
Instructions for installation:

Unzip the archive and copy the file cs_mansion_novi_source.bsp

Steam users:

C: \ Program Files \ Steam \ steamapps \ "username" \ counter-strike source \ cstrike \ maps

Retail Game:
C: \ Program Files \ Valve \ cstrike \ maps
/ * / * / * / * / *

This room has many hidden places, almost every bush can serve as a ladder.

The house has an attic, basement, hidden rooms.
Outside there is a children's home that is on the tree. 
Through the cables and ropes can walk so easily can reach the opponent from behind.

The pool is very deep, its walls may fall below the sign.
See what's happening in the well (this is a teleport spot)
In another timber, you can climb.

Explore the room I think you will like

Author:
Arnel Dzinic
